name: WooCommerce Birthday Discount Vouchers
author: WooExtension

sections.description:
Whenever a new user registers on your site with their birthday. The plugin automatically generates a coupon code based on the admin settings and email it to the registered user on their birthday.

The plugin internally uses the default woocommerce coupons so there are lots of filter and criteria options when you setup birthday discount vouchers.

Benefits:

  • Creates field for enter user’s date of birth in the registration page
  • Admin settings available to set different datepicker
  • Admin option available to make birthday fiel mandatory with validation message
  • Admin settings available to number of days before birthday send coupons
  • Uses wordpress native cron job to send coupons
  • Uses woocommerce native coupon system to generate unique coupons
  • many more features coming soon…

Important Notes

Upgrade to PRO to get many more advanced features and better support system
sections.installation:
1. Go to your admin area and select Plugins -> Add new from the menu.
  2. Search for “WooCommerce Birthday Discount Vouchers”.
  3. Click install.
  4. Click activate.
  5. Once the plugin is installed then you can go to the settings page from WooCommerce -> Settings -> Birthday Discount Voucher.
  6. Make necessary settings forthe plugin and you are done.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.3

  • Minor code optimized
  • Changed stable tag version number

Version 1.0.2

  • Fixed cron issue when plugin is not set enabled
  • minor code optimized

Version 1.0.1

  • Plugin made translation ready
  • Pro version class name conflict issue fixed

Version 1.0

  • Initial public release.
